page.title: 14Longdon Produce Show
page.content: This was held on Sept. 7th. and was organised for the first time by the village hall management committee. The {standard}of the entries was generally {good, }but the number of{ flowers and {vegetables} reflected the {poor summer of 1985. Contributors had made more cakes and pies, as if to compensate. Classes included packed lunch-boxes, plants, flower arrangements, craftwork and winemaking. There was also a childrens section. { Cups and trophies}were awarded: The {Parish Cup}for the{overall winner;}the {Runners - up Cup,} donated by local families; the {Hillworth Cup}for best {vegetable; }the{Cottagers Cup}for best {produce; The Flower Bowl; the {Applewick Trophy} for {children's work and the{Quincey Trophy }for {craftwork and{photography.
